entry.title: Honey PR Box
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nutria Fresh
Type:
Price: 5265.00

Beri (Sidr) Honey: Â 


Description: Dive into the divine nectar of Beri Honey, collected by bees from the blossoms of Sidr trees in the mountainous regions of Pakistan. This exquisite honey, with its 100% organic origins, delights with its reddish-brown hue, velvety texture, and sweet, fruity notes.1

Quick Facts: Beri Honey is your ally in allergy defense, soothing elixirs, digestion, weight management, skin health, blood sugar balance, antioxidant abundance, heart wellness, and nature's sweet sweetness.

How to Use: Drizzle it over juices, smoothies, teas, and coffees for natural sweetness. Elevate your culinary creations by substituting honey for sugar. For skincare, blend it with cinnamon for an acne-fighting mask or with lemon juice to fade dark spots.


Mix Nuts In Beri Honey:


Description: Mixing nuts in Beri Honey brings a delicious and nutritious fusion of textures and health benefits. Nuts contribute protein, fiber, healthy fats, and essential vitamins and minerals, while Beri Honey adds sweetness and antioxidants.

Quick Facts: Nuts like almonds, walnuts, cashews, peanuts, and pecans meet Beri Honey's antioxidants and anti-inflammatory properties to boost heart health, energy levels, immune defenses, and cellular protection.

How to Use: Create a trail mix, top your yogurt, enhance smoothies, or use it as a spread for a delightful, energy-boosting treat.


Honey With Saffron:


Description: Nutria Fresh's Honey With Saffron is an all-natural product made from raw organic honey infused with high-quality Saffron (Super Negin A+ European Grade). This fusion offers benefits like reduced skin issues, detoxification, and support for muscle and joint health.

Benefits: This combination detoxifies the blood, reduces cholesterol, and alleviates muscle weakness, joint, and back pains. For added benefits, mix one tablespoon in warm water in the morning or warm milk at bedtime.

How to Use: Enjoy one tablespoon of Honey With Saffron in a glass of warm milk for a wholesome wellness experience.


Salajeet (Shilajit):


Description: Salajeet, also known as Shilajit, is a natural substance formed over centuries by the gradual decomposition of organic matter in the Himalayan rocks. It's a sticky, dark brown or black substance with various potential health benefits.

Quick Facts: Salajeet offers improved energy levels, reduced inflammation, enhanced cognitive function, boosted immune system, improved heart health, increased testosterone levels (for men), improved fertility (for men), and boosted sexual performance (for men and women).

How to Use: Mix Shilajit powder with warm milk or water, take Shilajit capsules with food, add Shilajit liquid to smoothies or juices, or apply it topically to reduce inflammation and promote wound healing.


Saffron:


Description: Saffron is a precious spice derived from the saffron crocus flower and is known for its vibrant red color, intense aroma, and slightly bitter taste. It's a valuable addition to culinary and beverage delights.

Quick Facts: Saffron offers improved mood, enhanced cognitive function, reduced inflammation, improved heart health, and antioxidant protection.

How to Use: Infuse your dishes with its unique flavor, elevate your beverages, or consider saffron threads as a dietary supplement.

entry.title: Health & Slimness Trio Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nutria Fresh
Type:
Price: 6750.00

The Nutria Fresh Health & Slimness Trio Pack is the perfect solution for those who are looking to improve their overall health and well-being. This package includes three of Nutria Fresh's most popular products:

  • Gastric Relief: This powerful blend of natural ingredients is designed to soothe the stomach and relieve indigestion.
  • Slimming Tea: This delicious and refreshing tea helps boost metabolism and promote weight loss.
  • Slimming Solution: This innovative product helps to reduce fat absorption, making it easier to lose weight and keep it off.

Together, these three products work synergistically to help you achieve your health and fitness goals. Say goodbye to bloating, indigestion, and excess weight.

Hello to a healthier, happier you!

entry.title: Salajeet and Boostmatic Combo Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nutria Fresh
Type:
Price: 5400.00

The Salajeet and Boostmatic Combo Pack is a powerful duo that can help to improve overall health and well-being. It is a great choice for men who are looking to boost their energy, improve their physical performance, strengthen their immune system, reduce inflammation, balance their hormones, improve their mood and cognitive function, and enhance their sexual performance.

Key Benefits:

  • Increased energy and vitality
  • Improved physical performance
  • Stronger immune system
  • Reduced inflammation
  • Balanced hormones
  • Improved mood and cognitive function
  • Enhanced sexual performance
